column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
column21: Plunging Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG.
column183: Press: #O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!
column184: Hold: Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air.
column330: Embrace of Winds: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.
column331: Stormeye: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element in the party.
column332: Splitting Gales: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.
column333: Breeze of Reminiscence: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s. Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.
column334: Ode to Thousand Winds: Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column335: Hurricane of Freedom: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.
column336: Concerto dal Cielo: Increases the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column337: Storm of Defiance: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
